name: SpaceDust
0:
”Alexa, Open Space Dust”
”Alexa, Start Space Dust”
”Alexa, Play Space Dust”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space dust
des:
The team at VoiceSkillsInc is proud to bring you Space Dust.  A skill that is fully optimized for the Show and Spot devices using the new Alexa Presentation Language .  You’ll be presented with a full screen image of the NASA image of the day with a description.  For users without a display, the image description is read and the image is sent to the Alexa companion app.  Happy viewing and please leave us a review. 

If you would like us to build you a skill just click the contact us button on our website www.voiceskillsinc.com

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
